projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured online store with user authentication, product filtering, and secure payment integration. Features include a responsive design, shopping cart functionality, and order tracking.

projects.title: Dimensional Drift
projects.description: An innovative puzzle-platformer where players manipulate gravity and dimensions to solve challenging levels. Built with Unity and C#, featuring dynamic lighting and particle effects.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and drag-and-drop functionality. Features include team workspaces, task assignments, and progress tracking.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase projects, skills, and experience. Fully responsive with smooth animations and a dark/light mode toggle.

projects.title: AI Chatbot Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent chatbot powered by GPT-3.5 API for answering FAQs, booking appointments, and guiding users through product offerings.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker App
projects.description: A mobile-first fitness tracker that lets users log workouts, set goals, track progress, and view analytics. Includes social features and gamification elements.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker App
